ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I believe you dont get a decrease message if youre at the lowest of the scale for a particular faction. Example: Two different people in a group fighting
ygData.messageBody:
Well I believe you dont get a decrease message if youre at the lowest of the
scale for a particular faction.

Example: Two different people in a group fighting same mob get different
faction hits on same mob. That would indicate that one of the players would
have lowered his faction to a point where the hit would not matter cause it
cant be lower.

/Alex

-----Original Message-----
From: Nygaardr, FC3 [mailto:nygaardr@...]
Sent: den 18 maj 2001 11:46
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim


They are definitely on different factions. I have killed and lvl'd a lot in
BBM I have only found way to decrease "Citizens of Kaladim". But have yet
to found a mob that raises them. I don't think they would put in invisible
factions. You may have two different mobs that you will start out at
different base factions but still on the same faction.

Mu
55 Enchanter
55 Warrior
Tunare Server

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2001 5:22 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim



It's like invisible faction. It goes up slowly bc the citizens are linked to
one of the other factions. Does that make sense?
It's like how the faction with the merchants (both illegal and legal) in
Freeport go up even though it just says "Commons Residents". Faction is a
weird thing.
luv,
-Su

> Maybe they changed it but when I was killing them I didn't notice Citizen
> faction go up. Probably got changed because never saw a lesser spirit
spawn
> either. I am KOS from killing the citizens but have never bumped into a
> citizen inside Kaladim only in BBM spread out in various places.
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]

> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Faction for Iksars: Currently Kaladim

>
> Kill the goblins. Kill lots and lots of runnyeye goblins. This increases
> your faction with the people in Kaladim. Oh, and killing the BB bandits
will
> increase your faction with the citizens of Kaladim. Possibly the
Stormguard
> too. So get a group and pick off the bandits. Beware that PegLeg and his
> group undercon. They may be green but they hit hard and fast. They tend
not
> to stay rooted very long. They like to gang up on you. So get someone who
> can harmony/mezmerize or snare. Then kick the crap out of em one at a
time.
> If a lesser spirit spawns when you kill Peg Leg do NOT kill it. It is bad
> faction with shamans if you do.
> Also, keep the Runnyeye Warbeads to turn in to the guy in the same
building
> as the guy who takes the belts and pads.
> Byzar Bloodforge I think..
> luv,
> -Su
